short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Browser extension for learning vocabulary in foreign languages

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
LingoPop is an innovative browser extension designed to make language learning efficient and fun, focusing on the most common 1000 vocabulary words. It seamlessly integrates into your daily browsing, providing immersive and interactive exercises tailored to your language proficiency level, making it a perfect tool for busy individuals aiming to enhance their language skills effectively.

LingoPop is a language learning tool designed to enhance vocabulary acquisition in various languages. It introduces users to vocabulary questions at predefined intervals, prompting interaction even during casual browsing. The extension adapts to the user's selected language and personalizes the learning experience based on individual settings and progress.

Premium features and subscription plans offer advanced functionalities, including ad-free experiences and access to exclusive content.
